name: 2020 International conference and exhibition on Catalysis & Chemical Science
content: 2020 International conference and exhibition on Catalysis & Chemical Science which will be held during March 26-27, 2020, Madrid, Spain. It is a great opportunity for the participants from the universities and institutions to network with world class experts & scientists. Research Lake main goal is to unite all the chemistry experts, researchers, scientists, professors, students to discuss and share their knowledge, research results in the field of catalysis and chemical science.
